intro: The dice determined how the risky attempt goes. Roll the d13 (d10 + d4). Compare your total to the Difficulty. The d4 also determines your Effort - how well you succeed or how badly you fail.

targetDifficulty.title: Target Difficulty Calculation
targetDifficulty.numberCardExplanation: Roll equal to or higher than the card rank.

genrePoint.title: Genre Point?
genrePoint.description: Genre points allow you to reroll both dice. The point is removed from the game.

aptitude.title: Aptitude?
aptitude.description: If Suit matches Aptitude you can shift the effort die result up or down by one.
